_source.text: 3 Birmingham Detroit Country Day (3-0) - Burney's having a hard time deciding for himself which is better...Coach Mac and the 'Jackets explosive and multi-dimensional offense or their big play and ultra-aggressive 'D? Don't sleep on junior John Hill, probably the best second string tailback in the county.
